mapper.select: SELECT prof.*, depart.depart_name FROM btd.department_tb depart INNER JOIN btd.professor_tb prof ON depart.depart_id = prof.depart_id WHERE prof.prof_id =#{prof_id};

SELECT sub.*,dep.depart_name,prof.prof_name from subject_tb sub inner join department_tb dep on sub.depart_id = dep.depart_id inner join professor_tb prof on sub.prof_id = prof.prof_id order by sub.sub_year asc, sub.sub_semester asc;
mapper.insert: insert into department_tb(depart_name, college_name, depart_tel) values (#{depart_name},#{college_name},#{depart_tel});
mapper.select: SELECT prof_name from professor_tb where depart_id IN (select depart_id from department_tb where depart_name= #{depart_name})
